metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5041 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
dwarf_macro5.c in libdwarf before 20160923 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a debugging information entry using DWARF5 and without a DW_AT_name.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-5041` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20160507-1
libdwarf1 - 20160507-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160507-1').
